https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vWcXU9J2RxyHN9qRXW3GDhG40t3.jpg Madeline is married to Ernest, who was once arch-rival Helen's fiance. After recovering from a mental breakdown, Helen vows to kill Madeline and steal back Ernest. Unfortunately for everyone, the introduction of a magic potion causes things to be a great deal more complicated than a mere murder plot. Death Becomes Her
